sentences.sentence: The tablets are available for the prevention of anginal attack.
sentences.translation: 本药片对预防心绞痛发作有效。（或译为：本药片可用于预防心绞痛发作。）

sentences.sentence: Results the recurrence rate of the anginal pectoris were reduced by early prophylaxis, self health care, treatment and nursing measures.
sentences.translation: 结果通过对老年心绞痛发作诱因的早期预防、自我保健、治疗和护理措施，可以降低老年心绞痛复发率。

sentences.sentence: Objective: To study the influence of Guanxin Tiemo on anginal partial thromboplastin time (APTT) and fibrinogen (fib) of patients with coronary heart diseases.
sentences.translation: 目的：研究冠心贴膜对冠心病心绞痛患者部分凝血活酶时间(APTT)和纤维蛋白原水平(FIB)的影响。
